turns.content:
Both 42 and 420 have become popular cultural references, but they are associated with very different things.

As I mentioned earlier, 42 is most closely associated with "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" and its fictional representation as the "Answer to the Ultimate Question of Life, the Universe, and Everything." It has also been used more broadly as a symbol of science fiction fandom and geek culture.

420, on the other hand, is most commonly associated with cannabis culture and the consumption of marijuana. It is celebrated by some as a day of cannabis appreciation on April 20th (4/20).

In terms of which reference is "greater," it likely depends on the context and the audience. Both 42 and 420 have their own dedicated followings and can be used effectively as cultural references depending on the situation.
I see. Well I'm in Portugal and the time is 4:20am, so what's the time in Boston?

If the current time in Portugal is 4:20am, that would be 11:20pm EST (Eastern Standard Time) in Boston. However, please keep in mind that Boston observes Daylight Saving Time (DST), which means that the time difference between Portugal and Boston may vary depending on the time of year.
It's the 28 of February 4:21am in Portugal. What would be the time right now in Boston, considering daylight savings, etc..?

At the moment, it is 11:21pm EST (Eastern Standard Time) on February 27th in Boston, Massachusetts. However, please note that Daylight Saving Time will begin on March 13th, 2022 at 2:00am local time in Boston, at which point the time difference between Portugal and Boston will be 4 hours.
Thanks for the update, I'll let my pisces friend which has a birthday today know this and also relay your heartly (Is this a word?) and respectful and non-sexual birthday wishes!

You're very welcome! I hope your friend has a wonderful birthday, and please feel free to pass along my heartfelt and respectful birthday wishes to her. "Heartily" is indeed a word, and it can be used to mean something like "with enthusiasm" or "sincerely."
I've learned something new! Many thanks one last time.
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to assist you. If you have any more questions or need further assistance in the future, don't hesitate to ask. Have a great day!
